title: N8N Documentation Outdated UI References
description: N8N UI credential setup guide referenced non-existent 'HTTP Header Auth' credential type. Current 2025 N8N UI uses 'Generic Credential Type' with 'Header Auth' sub-option. Also discovered multiple active bugs in 2025 N8N affecting Generic Credential Types including credential values resetting to placeholders and Bearer tokens not being attached to requests.

solution.description: Fixed Knowledge Graph script toLowerCase undefined error and removed hardcoded API keys from documentation. Updated N8N guide with secure placeholder examples and proper environment variable references.
